name: AJAX
description: Request and receive other web pages. Note for cross-domain requests (including in preview mode), CORS must be set up on the server.

conditions.name: On completed
conditions.description: Triggered when an AJAX request completes successfully.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different AJAX requests.

conditions.name: On any completed
conditions.description: Triggered when any AJAX request completes successfully. The 'Tag' expression identifies the request.

conditions.name: On error
conditions.description: Triggered when an AJAX request fails.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different AJAX requests.

conditions.name: On any error
conditions.description: Triggered when any AJAX request fails. The 'Tag' expression identifies the request.

conditions.name: On progress
conditions.description: Triggered when an AJAX request has a progress update.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different AJAX requests.

conditions.name: On upload progress
conditions.description: Triggered when an AJAX request which is uploading data has a progress update.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different AJAX requests.

actions.name: Request URL
actions.description: Request a URL by a GET request and retrieve the server response.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different AJAX requests.

params.name: URL
params.description: The URL to request.  Note: most browsers prevent cross-domain requests.

actions.name: Request project file
actions.description: Request a file in the project and retrieve its contents.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different AJAX requests.

params.name: File
params.description: Select a project file to request.

actions.name: Post to URL
actions.description: Send data with a request to a URL and retrieve the server response.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different AJAX requests.

params.name: URL
params.description: The URL to post to.  Note: most browsers prevent cross-domain posts.

params.name: Data
params.description: The data to post, in query string form.  Be sure to URLEncode any user-entered data.

params.name: Method
params.description: The HTTP method to use, typically "POST".

actions.name: Set timeout
actions.description: Set the maximum time before a request is considered to have failed.

params.name: Timeout
params.description: The timeout for AJAX requests in seconds. Use -1 for no timeout.

actions.name: Set request header
actions.description: Set an HTTP header on the next request that is made.

params.name: Header
params.description: The HTTP header name to set on the request.

params.name: Value
params.description: A string of the value to set the header to.

actions.name: Override MIME type
actions.description: In the next request, override the MIME type indicated by the response.

params.name: MIME type
params.description: The MIME type to interpret the response as.

actions.name: Post binary to URL
actions.description: Send binary data with a request to a URL and retrieve the server response.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different AJAX requests.

params.name: URL
params.description: The URL to post to. Note: most browsers prevent cross-domain posts.

params.name: Data
params.description: The data to post, from a Binary Data object.

params.name: Method
params.description: The HTTP method to use, typically "POST".

actions.name: Set response binary
actions.description: Set a Binary Data object to receive the binary response of the next request.

params.name: Destination
params.description: The Binary Data object to receive the response in to.

actions.name: Set with credentials
actions.description: Set whether the next request is sent with credentials such as cookies and authorization headers.

params.name: With credentials
params.description: Whether the next request is sent with credentials.

expressions.name: LastData
expressions.description: Get the data returned by the last successful request.

expressions.name: Progress
expressions.description: Get the progress, from 0 to 1, of the request in 'On progress'.

expressions.name: Tag
expressions.description: Get the tag for the request in a trigger.

expressions.name: LastStatusCode
expressions.description: Get the HTTP status code of the last request.
